name: Spanish English Dictionary & Translator Free
description: Easily learn Spanish & English with Spanish English Dictionary & Translator app! Free download & no Internet connection required!  The Spanish English Dictionary & Translator app enables you to search Spanish & English words with definitions, examples, pronunciation, and more.  FEATURES  - Detailed word definitions & example sentences - Related search suggestions - Advanced sentences analyzer - Favorite words & search history - Flashcards for self-learning support - Customizable font sizes for better readability - Spanish, English & wildcard character search support - Spanish, British English & American English pronunciation with phonetics  Welcome to download the Spanish English Dictionary & Translator app!  ABOUT Bravolol   - Web site:  http://www.bravolol.com   - Facebook:  http://www.facebook.com/Bravolol   - Twitter:  https://twitter.com/BravololApps  - Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bravolol/  - Email:  cs@bravolol.com
